text: The men's 5000 metres event at the 2003 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Bydgoszcz, Poland, at Zawisza Stadion on 20 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Chris Thompson ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Mo Farah ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Robert Connolly ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
